thread.title: Bob Odenkirk and David Cross get sexy in the latest outrageous teaser for With Bob and David - US TV
thread.title_full: Bob Odenkirk and David Cross get sexy in the latest outrageous teaser for With Bob and David - US TV News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Bob Odenkirk and David Cross get sexy in the latest outrageous teaser for With Bob and David - US TV
text: Breaking Bad's Bob Odenkirk and Arrested Development's David Cross get downright sexy in the latest teaser for their Netflix sketch show With Bob and David.The team behind influential '90s comedy series Mr Show are back together for four half-hour specials.With sketches as irreverent as ever before, Odenkirk and Cross reunite with former Mr Show co-stars Scott Aukerman, John Ennis and Mary Lynn Rajskub.Among the newcomers pitching in include Keegan-Michael Key and MADtv's Arden Myrin.In addition to the half-hour episodes, Netflix has also produced a behind-the-scenes documentary on the making of With Bob and David.With Bob and David premieres on Netflix on November 13.
